"What is this bullshit you're spewing at me!!?"
"Trying to make me a punching bag you miserable worm!!?"
"I've made people charred kebab for lesser reasons!"
GabText You already summoned a blood golem to your party!
GabText Blood golem climbs up from your puddle of blood.
GabText There is no room for blood golem in your party!
GabText There is nothing to steal!
However, it was unable to escape!
GabText You have an advantage over the enemy!
GabText You were prepared for this, you don't cry.
GabText The bear calls you a slur.
Its words cut you like a knife. (or mabye the knife it hide in
its jacket cuts you like a knife).
